channel.title: Client Error
channel.description:
When i try and log in i get this message [code]Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: port out of r ange:87188 at java.net.InetSocketAddress.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.method19(client.java:269) at client.method84(client.java:6010) at client.method140(client.java:10538) at client.method7(client.java:2022) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:116) at client.run(client.java:4591) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
What dose it mean>?

item.title: Client Error
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ok, in your client.java of the client, or in your run code, you put “43594” when you were asked for the port offset. just put 0, and you should be fine.

If it’s in client.java, search for

anInt958

and replace that line with this:

anInt958 = 0;

if it’s your run code, replace your run code with this:

java client 0 0 lomem members 32

Read full topic

@xxx123xxx wrote:

lol port to high, 87188.
